Lucretia.TypeChecker.IsomorphicModuloNames

Description

Isomorphism between Type in context of Constraints which diregards differences in names of variables.

Synopsis

  • class IsomorphicModuloNames a where
    • iso :: (a, Constraints) -> (a, Constraints) -> Either String ()
    • isoM :: a -> a -> M ()
  • type M = ReaderT Environment (StateT Isomorphism (Either String))
  • type Environment = (Constraints, Constraints)
  • type Isomorphism = Set (Name, Name)
  • isomorphic :: M ()
  • notIsomorphic :: String -> M ()
